title: Account
body: I have two league accounts and one of them I am currently unable to log into the account is named vayneiac and for some reason I entered my username and password and it wasn't working it isn't my main but it has a rare skin on it and I have spent money for other skins on the account I do not think I verified my email with it and when I checked to see if it had any activity it hasn't so I do not understand what has happened to it. Please help me :(

replies.body: I checked up on that other account for you, and it *kind* of looks like someone might have been trying to hack their way into it! I don't want anything to happen, so be sure to reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) as soon as you can!
